title: Study for "Reading Wessex Heights, August 1987," from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
description: Man seated in a chair with his back to the viewer; he reads from a paper in his lap; the words \"Reading Wessex Heights/August 1987...\" scrawled in UR quadrant, followed by a citation from the poem (Wessex Heights, 1896)
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
